abstract: Here's a fortune I would love to find in a cookie: "There are some great Chinese restaurants in your future." Even better: "Several will be in New York, with many others scattered throughout the country."
snippet: Here's a fortune I would love to find in a cookie: "There are some great Chinese restaurants in your future." Even better: "Several will be in New York, with many others scattered throughout the country."
lead_paragraph: Editor's Note: Mimi Sheraton contributed a piece on formal dining to last week's Food and Drink issue. Sheraton, a longtime food critic for The New York Times, has been a food writer for more than 50 years.
